text: Franco Valtorta (born 4 August 1956) is an Italian rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Milan
title: Franco Valtorta
